### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE user_access (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	access_level INT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE user_access SET access_level = 1 WHERE user_id = 1;
